sentence_zh_TW: 每當我在公園散步時，我總是停下來撿起散落的垃圾。
sentence: Whenever I take a walk in the park, I always stop to ______ any litter that I find lying around.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個城市的碼頭是觀光客觀看日落的最佳地點之一。
sentence: The city's ______ is one of the best spots for tourists to watch the sunset.

sentence_zh_TW: 這座古老建築的每一根支柱都象徵著這個社區的堅韌和團結。
sentence: Each ______ in this ancient structure represents the strength and unity of the community.

sentence_zh_TW: 此管道將天然氣從遠方的生產地運送到城市，確保居民有充足的能源。
sentence: This ______ transports natural gas from the distant production site to the city, ensuring residents have adequate energy.

sentence_zh_TW: 這部電影講述了一位勇敢的海盜如何與敵對艦隊展開一場驚心動魄的海戰。
sentence: The movie tells the tale of a brave ______ battling against enemy fleets in a thrilling naval battle.

sentence_zh_TW: 這場比賽的明星投手在最後幾局中展現了他的技巧和毅力，幫助球隊獲得勝利。
sentence: The star ______ of the game showcased his skills and perseverance in the final innings, leading the team to victory.

sentence_zh_TW: 這家公司提供實習的安置，幫助學生獲得寶貴的工作經驗和職業技能。
sentence: This company offers internship ______ to help students gain valuable work experience and professional skills.

sentence_zh_TW: 在法庭上，辯護律師提出了一項懇求，希望法官能夠給予被告輕判。
sentence: In court, the defense attorney made a ______ hoping the judge would grant leniency to the defendant.

sentence_zh_TW: 他在法庭上懇求法官仁慈，相信這是他唯一的一次機會。
sentence: He stood before the judge to ______ for mercy, believing this was his only chance.

sentence_zh_TW: 他們在會議上做出了對環境保護的承諾，以發揮榜樣的作用。
sentence: They made a ______ to protect the environment during the meeting as a way to lead by example.

sentence_zh_TW: 在溫暖的夏天，孩子們喜歡從碼頭跳水進入清澈的湖水中。
sentence: On warm summer days, kids love to ______ off the dock into the clear lake water.

sentence_zh_TW: 在語言學中，複數形式用來表示超過一個的事物，這對理解語言至關重要。
sentence: In linguistics, the ______ form is used to indicate more than one of something, which is crucial for understanding language.

sentence_zh_TW: 這首歌的歌詞富有詩意，讓人回想起許多美好的回憶。
sentence: The lyrics of this song are so ______ that they evoke many wonderful memories.

sentence_zh_TW: 在露營時，小朋友們喜歡用棍子戳篝火，讓火焰更加旺盛。
sentence: While camping, kids love to ______ the campfire with sticks to make the flames grow stronger.

sentence_zh_TW: 這棟老房子的門廊是家庭聚會時大家聚集歡笑的地方。
sentence: The ______ of this old house is where family gatherings take place, filled with laughter and joy.

sentence_zh_TW: 他已經學會了這門課的內容，所以他大概可以通過考試。
sentence: He has learned the material for the course, so he will ______ pass the exam.

sentence_zh_TW: 在沒有其他證據的情況下，我們只能假設他會準時到達。
sentence: In the absence of any other evidence, we can only ______ that he will arrive on time.

sentence_zh_TW: 即使面對挑戰，我們相信正義最終會獲勝。
sentence: Even in the face of challenges, we believe that justice will ______ in the end.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個生態系統中，獅子是掠食者，而羚羊是它們的獵物。
sentence: In this ecosystem, lions are the predators and antelopes are their ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 在做出最終決定之前，我們會考慮先前的經驗和建議。
sentence: Before making the final decision, we will consider the ______ experiences and recommendations.
